text: This is the best coffee I've had since my Mom's percolator brand. The best part though is the cup can be re-used. I have a K-cap My-Kap Green Reusable 3 Piece Cap Set for K-Cups and I just clean out the cup and refill with whatever coffee I choose. It's really the perfect design for re-use as the grounds dry out completely overnight and dump out very easily. I'm buying the whole bean San Francisco coffee to grind and refill the cup. The possibilities are endless!
